helpers.coffee

Functions

  • exports.getNodes
  • exports.getFullName
  • exports.getAttr

AST helper functions

Useful functions for dealing with the CoffeeScript parse tree.

Functions

exports.getNodes(script)

Generates the AST from coffeescript source code. Adds a 'type' attribute to each node containing the name of the node's constructor, and returns the expressions array

exports.getFullName(variable)

Given a variable node, returns its full name

exports.getAttr(node, path)

Safe function for looking up paths in the AST. If an attribute is undefined at any part of the path, an object with is returned with the type attribute set to null
